source.title: Getting Started - Introduction
source.description: Zustand quickstart: npm installation, `create` function, hook-based store API, `set` function state merging, selector patterns for component binding, no context providers, zombie child and React concurrency handling.

source.title: APIs - createStore
source.description: `createStore` from `zustand/vanilla` for framework-agnostic stores: `setState`, `getState`, `getInitialState`, `subscribe` utilities, updater functions, primitives/objects/arrays updates, `replace` parameter, shallow merge, immutability patterns.

source.title: APIs - createWithEqualityFn ⚛️
source.description: `createWithEqualityFn` from `zustand/traditional` for React hooks with custom equality functions, `shallow` comparison, granular re-render control, `useSyncExternalStoreWithSelector` dependency, selectors, state updates, immutability patterns.

source.title: APIs - create ⚛️
source.description: `create` function for React hook stores with `setState`, `getState`, `getInitialState`, `subscribe` utilities, selectors, updater functions, primitives/objects/arrays updates, external actions pattern, immutability troubleshooting.

source.title: APIs - shallow
source.description: `shallow` utility from `zustand/vanilla/shallow` for top-level equality comparison: primitives, objects, Sets, Maps. Limitations with nested structures, prototype differences, `Object.is` comparison, performance optimisation.

source.title: Getting Started - Comparison
source.description: Zustand versus Redux, Valtio, Jotai, Recoil: immutable versus mutable state models, single store versus atom-based patterns, selector-based render optimisation, context provider requirements, architectural trade-offs.

source.title: Guides - Advanced TypeScript Guide
source.description: Advanced TypeScript patterns: curried `create<T>()()` syntax, `StateCreator` typing, `StoreMutatorIdentifier`, `Mutate`, higher-kinded mutators, middleware composition, slices pattern, bounded `useStore` hooks, `ExtractState`, custom middleware authoring.

source.title: Guides - Auto Generating Selectors
source.description: `createSelectors` helper generating `.use` accessors for properties and actions, `WithSelectors` type, React store and vanilla `createStore` variants, `StoreApi`/`UseBoundStore` types, third-party selector libraries.

source.title: Guides - Beginner TypeScript Guide
source.description: Beginner TypeScript: curried `create<T>()()`, interface-based state typing, selector patterns, store reset with `initialState`, `ExtractState`, `useShallow` for multiple selectors, derived state, `combine`/`devtools`/`persist` middlewares, async actions, `createWithEqualityFn`, multiple stores.

source.title: Guides - Connect to state with URL
source.description: URL state synchronisation via custom `StateStorage` with `persist` middleware, `location.hash` and query parameter patterns, `createJSONStorage`, `localStorage` fallback, `window.history.replaceState`, shareable URL generation.

source.title: Guides - Calling actions outside a React event handler in pre React 18
source.description: Pre-React 18 synchronous `setState` gotcha when calling actions outside event handlers, `unstable_batchedUpdates` wrapper from `react-dom` to prevent zombie-child effect and forced synchronous re-renders.

source.title: Guides - Flux inspired practice
source.description: Flux/Redux-inspired best practices: single store architecture, `set`/`setState` for immutable updates, colocated actions pattern, slices for large apps, `redux` middleware with `dispatch` function and reducers.

source.title: Guides - How to reset state
source.description: Reset store state patterns using `store.getInitialState()` method, single store reset action, `storeResetFns` Set for resetting multiple stores, custom `create` wrapper with `StateCreator` typing.

source.title: Guides - Immutable state and merging
source.description: Immutable state fundamentals: `set` function automatic shallow merge at one level, nested object spread operator patterns, `replace` boolean second parameter to disable merging, like React `useState`.

source.title: Guides - Initialize state with props
source.description: Dependency injection pattern using `createStore` with `React.createContext`, provider wrappers, `useStore` hook consumption, custom context hooks, `useStoreWithEqualityFn` for equality functions, `useShallow` memoisation.

source.title: Guides - Map and Set Usage
source.description: Immutable `Map` and `Set` updates in Zustand state, creating new instances for `set()`/`delete()`/`add()`/`clear()` operations, reference-based change detection, TypeScript type hints for empty collections.

source.title: Guides - Setup with Next.js
source.description: Next.js Zustand integration: per-request stores via `createStore`, `React.createContext` providers, SSR hydration handling, Pages Router and App Router patterns, RSC constraints, avoiding global module state.

source.title: Guides - Practice with no store actions
source.description: Store architecture patterns: colocated actions inside `create()` versus module-level external actions using `useBoundStore.setState`, hook-free action invocation, code splitting benefits, encapsulation trade-offs.

source.title: Guides - Prevent rerenders with useShallow
source.description: Prevent unnecessary rerenders with `useShallow` from `zustand/react/shallow`, wrap selectors returning arrays or objects, shallow equality comparison versus default `Object.is` reference checks.

source.title: Guides - Slices Pattern
source.description: Slices pattern for modular stores: individual slice creators with `set`/`get`, combining slices into bounded `useBoundStore`, cross-slice updates, middleware application to combined store, TypeScript integration.

source.title: Guides - SSR and Hydration
source.description: React SSR fundamentals with Express server, `ReactDOMServer.renderToPipeableStream()` for streaming, `hydrateRoot()` client hydration, stateless versus stateful rendering patterns, common hydration mismatch causes and troubleshooting.

source.title: Guides - Testing
source.description: Jest and Vitest testing setup: `__mocks__/zustand.ts` mock file, `storeResetFns` Set for automatic state reset, `getInitialState()`, React Testing Library integration, JSDOM configuration, component and store testing patterns.

source.title: Guides - Tutorial: Tic-Tac-Toe
source.description: Tic-tac-toe game tutorial with `combine` middleware, state lifting patterns, `history` array for time travel, `currentMove` tracking, immutable updates via `.slice()`, derived state computation, winner calculation.

source.title: Guides - Updating state
source.description: State updates using `set` function with flat shallow merge, deeply nested object handling via spread operators, Immer `produce()`, optics-ts `O.modify()`/`O.optic()`, Ramda `R.modifyPath()` utilities.

source.title: Hooks - useShallow ⚛️
source.description: `useShallow` hook from `zustand/react/shallow` for selector memoisation with shallow comparison, prevents unnecessary re-renders when selectors return new array or object references with structurally equal values.

source.title: Hooks - useStoreWithEqualityFn ⚛️
source.description: `useStoreWithEqualityFn` from `zustand/traditional` for vanilla stores in React with custom equality functions, requires `use-sync-external-store`, supports global stores, dynamic store factories, scoped context-based stores, `shallow` comparison.

source.title: Hooks - useStore ⚛️
source.description: `useStore` hook for vanilla `createStore` stores in React, selector functions, global stores, dynamic store factories via Map, scoped context-based stores with `createContext`/provider pattern, per-component independent state.

source.title: Integrations - Immer middleware
source.description: `immer` middleware from `zustand/middleware/immer` enables mutable syntax for immutable updates, simplifies nested object handling, requires `immer` dependency, gotchas for class objects requiring `[immerable]` symbol for subscriptions.

source.title: Integrations - Persisting store data
source.description: `persist` middleware with `createJSONStorage` for `localStorage`, `sessionStorage`, `AsyncStorage`, IndexedDB; `partialize`, `version`, `migrate`, `merge`, `skipHydration` options; `rehydrate`, `hasHydrated`, `onHydrate`, `onFinishHydration` API; Next.js SSR hydration mismatch patterns.

source.title: Integrations - Third-party Libraries
source.description: Third-party ecosystem: `@liveblocks/zustand` multiplayer, `zundo` undo/redo time-travel, `zustand-computed` computed states, `ngx-zustand` Angular adapter, `vue-zustand` Vue adapter, `zustand-sync-tabs` cross-tab sync, `simple-zustand-devtools` React DevTools, `zustand-forms` form management.

source.title: Middlewares - combine
source.description: `combine` middleware from `zustand/middleware` merges initial state with `StateCreator` for automatic TypeScript type inference, eliminates curried `create` syntax, works with `createStore` and `create` for simplified store definitions.

source.title: Middlewares - devtools
source.description: `devtools` middleware for Redux DevTools Extension integration, time-travel debugging, `actionsDenylist` filtering, `anonymousActionType` naming, `store` option for custom identifiers, Slices pattern support, `devtools.cleanup()` method.

source.title: Middlewares - immer
source.description: `immer` middleware from `zustand/middleware/immer` enabling mutable syntax for immutable state updates, `StateCreator` signature, `['zustand/immer', never]` mutator type, nested object updates without spread operators.

source.title: Middlewares - persist
source.description: `persist` middleware for state persistence across page reloads, `localStorage`/`sessionStorage`/custom storage via `createJSONStorage`, `partialize`, `version`, `migrate`, `merge`, `skipHydration`, manual `rehydrate()` API.

source.title: Middlewares - redux
source.description: `redux` middleware from `zustand/middleware` providing `dispatch` method with `reducerFn` and `initialState`, action-based state updates, typed actions, switch-case reducer pattern, `['zustand/redux', A]` mutator.

source.title: Middlewares - subscribeWithSelector
source.description: `subscribeWithSelector` middleware enabling selector-based `subscribe()` for partial state listening, callbacks triggered only when selected slice changes, fine-grained external state management, `['zustand/subscribeWithSelector', never]` mutator.

source.title: Migrations - Migrating to v4
source.description: Migration v3 to v4: TypeScript type changes for `create`, `StateCreator`, `PartialState`, `useStore`, `UseBoundStore`, `UseContextStore`, `createContext`, `combine`/`devtools`/`subscribeWithSelector`/`persist`/`redux` middleware parameters, `partialize` behaviour.

source.title: Migrations - How to Migrate to v5 from v4
source.description: Migration v4 to v5: dropped default exports, `createWithEqualityFn` for custom equality, `useShallow` hook, stable selector requirements, stricter `setState` types with `replace` flag, `persist` middleware changes, React 18 minimum.

source.title: Previous Versions - createContext from zustand/context
source.description: Deprecated `createContext` from `zustand/context` (v3.5-v4) for scoped stores with `Provider` and `useStore`, prop-based initialisation, migration to v4 manual context pattern with `createStore`, `useRef`, `useContext`.
